entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Fog patches developing overnight. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 10. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late in the evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 13 April 2023
